name: Aperol Spritz
description: Classic Italian aperitif with a fresh orange flavor and sparkling wine. Perfect for summer evenings.

name: Black Devil's Ice Tea
description: Strong cocktail with a mix of four spirits and a fresh blackberry note. Perfect for parties.

name: Cherry Bitherinho
description: Unique cocktail with Jägermeister and cherries. A perfect balance of bitter and sweet.

name: Red Bull Vodka
description: Energizing combination of vodka and Red Bull. Perfect for long nights and parties.

name: Classic Gin & Tonic
description: Elegant and refreshing cocktail with the botanical notes of gin and a bitter tonic.

name: Moscow Mule
description: Refreshing cocktail with vodka and ginger beer. Traditionally served in a copper mug.

name: Rum & Cola (Cuba Libre)
description: Classic combination of rum and cola with a touch of fresh lime juice for an authentic Cuban experience.

name: Draft Beer
description: Rotating tap: one keg at a time. Expect crisp lagers and seasonal picks. Always cold, foamy, and poured to perfection.

name: Radler Isotonic (0.0%)
description: Innovative mix of beer with isotonic minerals. Non-alcoholic version (0.0%) with orange and lemon balm flavors.

name: Heineken 0.0
description: World-famous Dutch beer in a non-alcoholic version. The full taste of real beer without alcohol.

name: Water
description: Fresh drinking water. The essence of life and perfect for hydration at any moment.

name: Red Bull
description: World-renowned energy drink with caffeine and taurine. Gives you wings and energy for active moments.

name: Iced Tea
description: Refreshing cold tea, perfect for summer days. A classic drink with a gentle tea flavor and cooling effect.

name: Jägermeister
description: German herbal liqueur with more than 56 natural ingredients. A complex flavor with a unique blend of herbs and spices.

name: Borovničke
description: Traditional Slovenian fruit brandy made from local blueberries. Intense wild berry flavor with a long-standing tradition.

name: Žalios Devynerios
description: Lithuanian herbal liqueur from the devynerios family: aromatic, bitter‑sweet blend of botanicals with notes of roots, citrus peel, and spice. Best served ice‑cold as a shot.
